unpublishedAction.name: fetch_issues

actionConfiguration.body:
select global_issues.*, count(global_issues.id), count(issue_upvote.id) as upvote_id, COALESCE (github_issues.total_reactions, 0) as total_reactions, COALESCE(github_issues.unique_commentors,0) as unique_commentors, GREATEST(MAX(issue_upvote.created_at), MAX(global_issues.created_at)) as updated_at from global_issues left join github_issues on github_issues.id = global_issues.github_issue_id left join issue_upvote on global_issues.id = issue_upvote.issue_id where global_issues.title ilike '{{ "%" + Table1.searchText + "%" }}' {{appsmith.URL.queryParams.id ? " and global_issues.id=" + appsmith.URL.queryParams.id: ""}} and global_issues.state != 'DELETED' {{ type_filter.selectedOptionValue && type_filter.selectedOptionValue !== "ALL" ? "and global_issues.type ='" + type_filter.selectedOptionValue + "'" : "" }} {{ pod_filter.selectedOptionValue && pod_filter.selectedOptionValue !== "ALL" ? "and '" + pod_filter.selectedOptionValue +  "'=ANY(global_issues.labels)" : "" }} 
{{ status_filter.selectedOptionValue && status_filter.selectedOptionValue !== "ALL" ? "and '" + status_filter.selectedOptionValue + "' =ANY(global_issues.states)" : "" }} group by global_issues.id, github_issues.id, global_issues.github_issue_id, global_issues.author, global_issues.created_at, global_issues.title, global_issues.description, global_issues.labels, global_issues.type, global_issues.state, global_issues.answer, global_issues.link, global_issues.states, github_issues.total_reactions, github_issues.unique_commentors order by {{sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "GITHUB" ? "total_reactions desc, count desc, upvote_id desc" : sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "VOTES" ? "count desc, upvote_id desc, total_reactions desc" : sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "COMMENTORS" ? "unique_commentors desc, total_reactions desc, count desc, upvote_id desc" : "updated_at desc" }} offset {{(Table1.pageNo - 1) * Table1.pageSize}} limit {{Table1.pageSize}}

jsonPathKeys: sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "GITHUB" ? "total_reactions desc, count desc, upvote_id desc" : sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "VOTES" ? "count desc, upvote_id desc, total_reactions desc" : sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "COMMENTORS" ? "unique_commentors desc, total_reactions desc, count desc, upvote_id desc" : "updated_at desc"

publishedAction.name: fetch_issues

actionConfiguration.body:
select global_issues.*, count(global_issues.id), count(issue_upvote.id) as upvote_id, COALESCE (github_issues.total_reactions, 0) as total_reactions, COALESCE(github_issues.unique_commentors,0) as unique_commentors, GREATEST(MAX(issue_upvote.created_at), MAX(global_issues.created_at)) as updated_at from global_issues left join github_issues on github_issues.id = global_issues.github_issue_id left join issue_upvote on global_issues.id = issue_upvote.issue_id where global_issues.title ilike '{{ "%" + Table1.searchText + "%" }}' {{appsmith.URL.queryParams.id ? " and global_issues.id=" + appsmith.URL.queryParams.id: ""}} and global_issues.state != 'DELETED' {{ type_filter.selectedOptionValue && type_filter.selectedOptionValue !== "ALL" ? "and global_issues.type ='" + type_filter.selectedOptionValue + "'" : "" }} {{ pod_filter.selectedOptionValue && pod_filter.selectedOptionValue !== "ALL" ? "and '" + pod_filter.selectedOptionValue +  "'=ANY(global_issues.labels)" : "" }} 
{{ status_filter.selectedOptionValue && status_filter.selectedOptionValue !== "ALL" ? "and '" + status_filter.selectedOptionValue + "' =ANY(global_issues.states)" : "" }} group by global_issues.id, github_issues.id, global_issues.github_issue_id, global_issues.author, global_issues.created_at, global_issues.title, global_issues.description, global_issues.labels, global_issues.type, global_issues.state, global_issues.answer, global_issues.link, global_issues.states, github_issues.total_reactions, github_issues.unique_commentors order by {{sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "GITHUB" ? "total_reactions desc, count desc, upvote_id desc" : sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "VOTES" ? "count desc, upvote_id desc, total_reactions desc" : sort_select.selectedOptionValue === "COMMENTORS" ? "unique_commentors desc, total_reactions desc, count desc, upvote_id desc" : "updated_at desc" }} offset {{(Table1.pageNo - 1) * Table1.pageSize}} limit {{Table1.pageSize}}

actionConfiguration.body: select * from issue_upvote where issue_id = {{Table1.selectedRow.id}}
select * from issue_upvote where issue_id = {{Table1.selectedRow.id}}

INSERT INTO issue_upvote
  (link, comment, author, created_at, issue_id, id)
VALUES
  (
    '{{ comment_link_input.text }}',
    '{{ comment_input.text }}',
		'{{ appsmith.user.email }}',
		now(),
		{{Table1.selectedRow.id}},
		(SELECT max(id) + 1
FROM public."issue_upvote")
  );

INSERT INTO issue_upvote
  (link, comment, author, created_at, issue_id, id)
VALUES
  (
    '{{ comment_link_input.text }}',
    '{{ comment_input.text }}',
		'{{ appsmith.user.email }}',
		now(),
		{{Table1.selectedRow.id}},
		(SELECT max(id) + 1
FROM public."issue_upvote")
  );

unpublishedAction.name: getLabels

publishedAction.name: getLabels

actionConfiguration.body: select * from github_issues where title ilike {{ "%" + this.params.searchText + "%" }} or issue_number ::text ilike {{ "%" + this.params.searchText + "%" }}
select * from github_issues where title ilike {{ "%" + this.params.searchText + "%" }} or issue_number ::text ilike {{ "%" + this.params.searchText + "%" }}

INSERT INTO global_issues
  (title, description, github_issue_id, author, created_at, labels, type, answer, link, states, state, id)
VALUES
  (
    '{{ title_input.text }}',
    '{{ description_input.text }}',
    {{ add_issue_select.selectedOptionValue }},
		'{{ appsmith.user.email }}',
		now(),
		'{{ "{" + (this.params.labels ?? []).join(",") + "}" }}',
		'{{ type_select.selectedOptionValue }}',
		'{{answer_input.text}}',
		'{{link_input.text}}',
		'{{"{" + states_select.selectedOptionValues.join(",") + "}"}}',
		'Opened',
		(SELECT max(id) + 1 FROM public."global_issues")
  );

INSERT INTO global_issues
  (title, description, github_issue_id, author, created_at, labels, type, answer, link, states, state, id)
VALUES
  (
    '{{ title_input.text }}',
    '{{ description_input.text }}',
    {{ add_issue_select.selectedOptionValue }},
		'{{ appsmith.user.email }}',
		now(),
		'{{ "{" + (this.params.labels ?? []).join(",") + "}" }}',
		'{{ type_select.selectedOptionValue }}',
		'{{answer_input.text}}',
		'{{link_input.text}}',
		'{{"{" + states_select.selectedOptionValues.join(",") + "}"}}',
		'Opened',
		(SELECT max(id) + 1 FROM public."global_issues")
  );

actionConfiguration.body:
update global_issues set 
title = {{edit_title_input.text}}, 
description = {{edit_description_input.text}},
type = {{edit_type_input.selectedOptionValue}},
labels = {{ "{" + this.params.labels.join(",") + "}" }}::text[],
answer = {{edit_answer_input.text}},
github_issue_id = {{edit_issue_select.selectedOptionValue || Table1.selectedRow.github_issue_id}},
link = {{edit_link_input.text}},
states = {{"{" + edit_states_select.selectedOptionValues.join(",") + "}"}}::text[] where id = {{Table1.selectedRow.id}}

update global_issues set 
title = {{edit_title_input.text}}, 
description = {{edit_description_input.text}},
type = {{edit_type_input.selectedOptionValue}},
labels = {{ "{" + this.params.labels.join(",") + "}" }}::text[],
answer = {{edit_answer_input.text}},
github_issue_id = {{edit_issue_select.selectedOptionValue || Table1.selectedRow.github_issue_id}},
link = {{edit_link_input.text}},
states = {{"{" + edit_states_select.selectedOptionValues.join(",") + "}"}}::text[] where id = {{Table1.selectedRow.id}}
